===Overview===
[[File:Flag_of_France.png|thumb|left|Flag of France]]
The '''French Empire''' was a [[Earth|worldwide system]] of dependencies under the sovereignty of the crown of [[France]]. It began in [[France]] followed by the conquest over the rest of the [[Europe]]. The empire's capital was in [[Paris]]. At its height in the late 19th and early 20th centuries it was one of the largest empire in history. Trade ties with nations outside of its sovereignty reinforced its global dominance. 

==Early Years==
The French Empire constituted the overseas colonies, protectorates and mandate territories that came under French rule from the 16th century onward.{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Canada]]'s entry}} 

===17th Century===
In 1627 A.D. French rename the region [[North America]] "New France" as part French Empire.{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Canada]]'s entry}}

===18th Century===
In the early 1700's, the French sorcerer [[Jean-Pierre Beaubier (Earth-616)|Mauvais]] arrived in Canada in search of the [[Wendigo]] to gain its powers. He was stopped by the combined efforts of the Gods of the North and the [[Sorcerer Supreme]] of the day. He was locked immobile. As Canada was French territory at the time, he was imprisoned in a renowned French prison known as the ''La prison de la Morte''.{{r|Wolverine Vol 2 #164}}

In 1756 A.D., [[Seven Years' War]] begins, between [[New France]] and the British colonies. After early French successes, the settlement of Quebec falls in 1759 and the British advance on Montreal.{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Canada]]'s entry}}

In 1798, [[Napoléon Bonaparte (Earth-616)|Napoléon Bonaparte]]'s took his armies on a campaign into the Ottoman territories of [[Egypt]] and [[Syria]] {{r|Amazing High Adventure Vol 1 3}}

==First Empire (1804–1814)==
===19th Century===
====[[Napoleonic Wars]]====
The First Colonial Empire was formed by [[Napoléon Bonaparte (Earth-616)|Napoléon Bonaparte]]. He led his country in the conquest of much of [[Europe]],{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[France]]'s entry}} including [[Belgium]], only a few years after their independence in 1789 (who had been inspired by the [[French Revolution]]).{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[Belgium]]'s entry}}
====Time Crisis====
Napoleon and more than one hundred of his soldiers suddenly were taken from their time and transported to [[Dodge City]] in 1871. Eventually, the heroes managed to solve the time-crisis. Napoleon and all of his men returned home.{{r|The Weird, Weird West}}

The first empire lasted until 1814.{{r|Marvel Atlas #2|; [[Canada]]'s entry}}

==Second Empire (1830-1962)==
France returned to be a monarchy.{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[France]]'s entry}} and the The Second Colonial Empire was formed with the conquest of [[Algiers (Algeria)|Algiers]], [[Algeria]] in 1830.{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; Algeria's entry}}

The Empire moved into [[Asia]] conquering the regions that would one day be known as [[Cambodia]]{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; Cambodia's entry}}, [[Laos]] and [[Vietnam]]{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; Vietnam's entry}} and administered by [[France]] from 1863 to 1953.{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; Cambodia's entry}}

[[Sin-Cong]] was founded as a French protectorate in the 1850's and remained under French supervision for decades. Government officials such as [[Armand Duquesne (Earth-616)|Armand Duquesne]] abused their social standing to torment the Sin-Congese.{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; Sin-Cong's entry}}

===20th Century===
====[[World War II]]====
During [[World War II]], the [[French Foreign Legion (Earth-616)|French Foreign Legion]] were operating in [[Algeria]] with Soldier of Fortune [[Robert Strong (Earth-616)|Captain Robert Strong]]. During his tenure with the Legion he helped investigate the robberies of supply caravans, putting a stop to [[Ali Hassan (Earth-616)|Ali Hassan]] and his army of thieves.{{r|Daring Mystery Comics #3}}

==End of the Empire (1946–1962)==
===[[First Indochina War]]===
The second colonial empire came to an end after the loss in later wars of [[First Indochina War]] with [[Vietnam]] in 1954.{{r|Young Allies Comics 70th Anniversary Special Vol 1 1}}

In 1962, [[Algeria]] gained it's independence from France.{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; Algeria's entry}}

After that they had a relatively peaceful decolonizations elsewhere after 1960.{{r|Marvel Atlas #1|; [[France]]'s entry}}
